data.text:
FLASH SALE 🔥
Fly to or from London Gatwick and enjoy a well-deserved spring break! Get your tickets now and get 20% OFF! Book today and travel until 30 June 2022!👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/27vMQSBNdg

data.text:
GREAT BRITISH SALE 🔥
If you were waiting for a sign to book a flight, this is it! Snatch up one of 10.000 seats for only 8.99 GBP to or from the UK 🇬🇧.  Get your tickets this weekend and travel until 31 May 2022! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/jCwVxe5r4b
How badly do you want winter to end and spring to finally begin?

WIZZ MAP CHALLENGE 🗺
From Europe's official fashion capital to the birthplace of rakia, a famous Balkan spirit – can you figure out which WIZZ route we are hinting at here? Check out our blank map for more clues and comment your best guess below! 👇 https://t.co/Xs4CU1VyUB

data.text: Have you tried our business class? Neither have we. Wizz Air has never had business class seating, another example of needless emissions. And that's just one reason out of seven why WIZZ is your greenest choice when flying: https://t.co/pIunfsW0pw #flythegreenest https://t.co/iHzyEc95qu

NEW ROUTES FROM THE UK 🇬🇧
Looking for the perfect destination for your next vacation? You might have just found it! With WIZZ, you can now travel from London to Bourgas, Varna, Venice and Palermo directly. Book your ticket now on https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF! https://t.co/T3C5WWVG1u

Our Airbus A321neos are not just beautiful. We have the youngest, most modern fleet among European competitor airlines with 50+ aircraft. And that's just one reason out of seven why WIZZ is your greenest choice when flying: https://t.co/pIunftdBh4 #flythegreenest https://t.co/4XvOZ5QzmL

data.text: Book selected flights to or from the UK 🇬🇧 for only 8.99 GBP and fly before 28 February with WIZZ! What's more, if you are headed there after 11 February and you are fully vaccinated, you no longer need to take a Covid test to enter the country. 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/faIqm07QF1

⚠️ MAJOR UPGRADE BETWEEN 25 & 26 JANUARY ⚠️
Our online platforms and services will be down from 8 PM CET 25 January due to a system upgrade. Please finalize your booking, check in online and save your boarding pass if you are flying during this period! https://t.co/RJfIHgxI0f

data.text: Authentic charm, old-world knowledge, overwhelming history – Naples is chock-full of life and unique, down-to-earth experiences. With WIZZ, you can travel to this world-famous city directly from London! Don't wait any longer, book your ticket now on https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF! https://t.co/Pxa8ctPKcV

Besides being Europe's fastest-growing airline, WIZZ now officially has the youngest fleet in Europe and the third youngest worldwide, according to ch-aviation. We are committed to being the most sustainable airline & will further reduce the age of our fleet in the coming years. https://t.co/GnGtwoU2yw

data.text: Fly for less. That’s it. Click on the link and find out how much you can save on flights by joining the WIZZ Discount Club 👉 https://t.co/oFXecGxqRL https://t.co/CoQJ7yC6x5

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: Want to surprise yourself or your loved ones with an adventure to kick off 2022? Now is your chance to plan your first trip of the new year! Book selected flights to or from the UK with 25% OFF between 26-27 December and travel up until 15 June 2022! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/xpJGkzvAKm

Want to experience Wizz Air's dream destinations like never before? After a big showcase in Milan, we brought our state-of-the-art HyperGram technology-powered 3D experience to Budapest. Check out our video, and stay tuned for the next one! https://t.co/hYGpOZEehV

data.text: Happy Holidays from the WIZZ family to yours! 🎁🎄 We hope you have plenty of time to relax, hang out with your loved one's and enjoy some amazing food! Hope to see you soon on board! https://t.co/unFxkJvStW

Don’t you sometimes wish to be transported back in time, especially at the end of another complex year? Rediscover the past and make plans for the future in Vienna, Budapest or Venice, and gift a WIZZ voucher this Christmas! 👉  https://t.co/p0058FG6vH https://t.co/zDrBKnCwhI

data.text: Christmas comes only once a year, so you really don't want to worry too much about getting home in time, right? If you need more info on flights during the winter holidays, you can always ask WIZZ Virtual Assistant Amelia for help on Facebook Messenger. https://t.co/6xfBBmBJeE

data.text:
Hey London, check this out! We added a load of new direct routes from @Gatwick_Airport and Luton airport, so now Rome, Milan, Vienna are  only a plane ride away! Book your tickets now 👉  https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF @VINCIAirports
@VINCIConcess https://t.co/DxX4bTGUFp

With WIZZ you can give someone the chance to get away from the noise and experience Serenity together. Plan your getaway to Bari, Vilnius or Malta and gift a voucher this Christmas! 👉https://t.co/p0058FG6vH https://t.co/gK5Sgvd397

data.text: Flying is always fun, but it’s the most fun when you're visiting friends or family. Now you can do so by travelling from Bari to Venice, from Budapest to Amman, and from Debrecen to Brussels or Kyiv directly with WIZZ! Book now on https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF! https://t.co/RQIAkDwD2m

data.text: As Europe's fastest-growing airline, expansion at WIZZ never stops. This time, we are expanding at London Gatwick airport where we acquired a substantial number of new slots - meaning we can offer more low-fare travel opportunities and add 4 new WIZZ aircraft from Spring 2022. https://t.co/zsZmjuagso

data.text: What do you do during the longest night of the year? Well, you can light some candles to get in the Christmas spirit. But better yet, you could just brave the cold outside and admire the natural northern lights in Reykjavik. Book your ticket now! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/MXAXOUFgwh

Our curiosity leads us to the best adventures. Show someone you love that there is a whole new world out there to discover. Travel with WIZZ to Abu Dhabi, Amman or Larnaca and gift a voucher for Christmas! 👉 https://t.co/p0058FG6vH https://t.co/4JqJrDdIKL

data.text:
Have you had enough of the cold? Enjoy some well-deserved winter sun ☀️
Book selected flights to or from Abu Dhabi today with WIZZ and get as much as 20% OFF! Plan your trip and travel until 26 March 2022 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/xXeRgNMDYl
